messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

scheduled task for ops dc friday march pm scheduled task hi scheduled task assigned operational similar other tasks task task almost identical task name differs task trigger once every tuesday having next summary restart description name schedule restart restart thank best regards monitoring engineer

I'm currently analyzing the provided IT ticket text, specifically focusing on the phrases "scheduled task." My goal is to accurately assign it to one of the predefined categories: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, or Administrative rights.
